Spanish: ¿Qué puedes hacer por mí?

English: I am making the rounds in order to hear the opinions of people in Darken. May I help you?
Spanish: Estoy dando vueltas para escuchar la opinion de la gente de Darken. ¿Puedo ayudarte?

English: I am the Mayor of Darken City.
Spanish: Soy el Alcalde de la ciudad de Darken.

English: For Darken!
Spanish: ¡Por Darken!

English: Hmm It seems that you are not the party leader, or you have less than 3 party members. Also, it may not have been more than 2 days since you left your old guild.
Spanish: Hmm. Parece que no eres el líder de la party, o tienes menos de 3 miembros de party. Además, es posible que no hayan pasado más de 2 días desde que dejaste tu antigua guild.

English: Are you ready to create your new guild? If you are not, please go I am very busy right now.
Spanish: ¿Estás preparado para crear tu nueva guild? Si no lo estás, vete por favor. Estoy muy ocupado en este momento.

English: Create Guild
Spanish: Crear Guild

English: Keep Going
Spanish: Sigue Adelante

English: Leave my sight if you lack the necessary skills to succeed!
Spanish: ¡Déjame ver si te tienes las habilidades necesarias para triunfar!

English: Speak with the Mayor of Saint City and complete the tasks he gives you. Then, collect the Rubies of Joy, Anger, and Sorrow. \n#bRequirement:\n - Must be the leader of a party and all party members must be between level 70 and 75.
Spanish: Habla con el alcalde de Saint y completa las tareas que te de. Luego, consigue los Rubíes de Alegría, Ira y Tristeza. \n#bRequisito:\n - Debes ser el líder de la party y todos los miembros de la party deben estar entre el nivel 70 y 75.

English: You can't do this by yourself, you fool! Come back when you find some friends
Spanish: ¡No puedes hacer esto solo, idiota! Vuelve cuando encuentres algunos amigos.

English: You will need to wait before you can challenge Iblis Leanes again.
Spanish: Tendrás que esperar para poder desafiar al Adorador de Iblis de nuevo.

English: I cannot help you until you bring me the Rubies of Joy, Anger and Sorrow.
Spanish: No puedo ayudarte hasta que me traigas los Rubíes de Alegría, Ira y Dolor.

English: If you bring me the rubies of Joy, Anger and Sorrow, I will allow you access to a secret tomb containing the creature Iblis Leanes.
Spanish: Si me traes los Rubíes de Alegría, Irá y Dolor, te permitiré acceder a una tumba secreta que contiene al Adorador de Iblis.

English: Are you too afraid to confront Iblis Leanes? Very well, as you wish.
Spanish: ¿Tienes demasiado miedo como para enfrentarte al Adorador de Iblis? Muy bien, como quieras.

English: I have no interest in getting to know you, stranger. Just bring me the rubies, and I will take you to the tomb.
Spanish: No tengo ningún interés en conocerte, forastero. Tan solo tráeme los rubíes y te llevaré a la tumba.

English: Iblis Leanes awaits a new challenger. Will you avenge the souls he bewitched?
Spanish: El Adorador de Iblis espera un nuevo retador. ¿Vengarás las almas que hechizó?

English: Ugh, I am so BORED! Isn't there anyone out there that can make me laugh? Isn't there anything fun to do?
Spanish: ¡Uf, estoy tan ABURRIDO! ¿No hay nadie ahí fuera que pueda hacerme reír? ¿No hay nada divertido que hacer?

English: If you happen across any strange keys during your travels, do you mind trying them on this lock? Thanks!
Spanish: Si te encuentras con llaves extrañas durante tus viajes, ¿te importaría probarlas en esta cerradura? ¡Gracias!

English: Hey, you there! Listen, I need some entertainment. It's pretty cramped in here. Do you know any jokes? Please, anything! I'd even settle for a 'Knock-knock' joke at this point!
Spanish: ¡ Oye, tú! Escucha, necesito algo de entretenimiento. Esto es bastante pequeño. ¿Conoces algunos chistes? ¡Por favor, lo que sea! ¡Hasta me conformaría con una broma de 'Toc-toc' en este momento!

English: I am most certainly not a well-known Magician that accidentally locked himself inside of a Magic Box. Nope, that's not me, and I haven't seen anyone like that. Nope. Anywho, so an Acrobat, a Mercenary and an Aibatt walk into a bar...
Spanish: Soy un Magician poco conocido que accidentalmente se quedó encerrado dentro de una Caja Mágica. No, ese no soy yo, y no he visto a nadie así. No. Tema aparte, un Acrobat, un Mercenary y un Aibatt entran en un bar...

English: Gee, I hope there's enough air in here... Farewell!
Spanish: Vaya, espero que haya suficiente aire aquí... ¡Adiós!

English: I will give you a bead if you bring me sesame cake.
Spanish: Te daré una bola si me traes tartas de sésamo.

English: I will give you a Red Bead if you bring me 700 sesame cake.
Spanish: Te daré una Bola Roja si me traes 700 tartas de sésamo.

English: I am Evil Tobby, the oldest of the Iblis brothers.
Spanish: Soy Evil Tobby, el mayor de los hermanos Iblis.

English: Happy Thanksgivingday! Hmmm maybe not so happy.
Spanish: ¡Feliz día de acción de gracias! Hmmm tal vez no tan feliz.

English: I told you I will give you a bead if you bring me some sesame cakes.
Spanish: Te dije que te daría una bola si me traes tartas de sésamo.

English: I will give you an Orange Bead if you bring me 700 sesame cakes.
Spanish: Te daré una Bola Naranja si me traes 700 tartas de sésamo.

English: I am Evil Dorry, the second oldest of the Iblis brothers.
Spanish: Soy Evil Dorry, el segundo mayor de los hermanos Iblis.

English: Happy Thanksgivingday!? Yeah right!
Spanish: ¿¡Feliz día de acción de gracias!? ¡Sí claro!

English: I told you I will give you a bead if you bring me sesame cakes.
Spanish: Te dije que te daría una bola si me traes tartas de sésamo.

English: I will give you a Yellow Bead if you bring me 400 sesame cakes.
Spanish: Te daré una Bola Amarilla si me traes 400 tartas de sésamo.

English: I am Evil Nana, the third oldest of the Iblis brothers.
Spanish: Soy Evil Nana, el tercer mayor de los hermanos Iblis.

English: Happy Thanksgivingday!? Maybe.
Spanish: ¿¡Feliz día de acción de gracias!? Quizás.

English: I told you I will give you a bead if you bring me some sesame cakes.
Spanish: Te dije que te daría una bola si me traes tartas de sésamo.

English: I will give you a Green Bead if you bring me 200 sesame cakes.
Spanish: Te daré una Bola Verde si me traes 200 tartas de sésamo.

English: I am Evil Tubby, the fourth oldest of the Iblis brothers.
Spanish: Soy Evil Tubby, el cuarto mayor de los hermanos Iblis.

English: Happy Thanksgivingday!? No not really.
Spanish: ¿¡Feliz día de acción de gracias!? No en realidad no.

English: I told you I will give you a bead if you bring me some sesame cakes.
Spanish: Te dije que te daría una bola si me traes tartas de sésamo.

English: I will give you a Blue Bead if you bring me 100 sesame cakes.
Spanish: Te daré una Bola Azul si me traes 100 tartas de sésamo.

English: I am Evil Pho, the youngest of the Iblis brothers.
Spanish: Soy Evil Pho, el más joven de los hermanos Iblis.

English: Happy Thanksgivingday!? Not at all! Hahaha
Spanish: ¿¡Feliz día de acción de gracias!? ¡Para nada! Jajaja

English: I will give you a seedling if you bring me leaves.
Spanish: Te daré un brote si me traes hojas.

English: I will give you a Fir Seedling if you bring me 100 leaves.
Spanish: Te daré un Brote de Abeto si me traes 100 hojas.

English: My name is Firdryad.
Spanish: Mi nombre es Firdryad.

English: I hope everything goes well with you!
Spanish: ¡Espero que todo te vaya bien!

English: I will give you a seedling if you bring me leaves.
Spanish: Te daré un brote si me traes hojas.

English: I will give you a Persimmon Seedling if you bring me 300 leaves.
Spanish: Te daré un Brote de Caqui si me traes 300 hojas.

English: My name is Persdryad.
Spanish: Mi nombre es Persdryad.

English: I hope everything goes well with you!
Spanish: ¡Espero que todo te vaya bien!

English: I will give you a seedling if you bring me leaves.
Spanish: Te daré un brote si me traes hojas.

English: I will give you a Pear Seedling if you bring me 600 leaves.
Spanish: Te daré un Brote de Pera si me traes 600 hojas.

English: My name is Peardryad.
Spanish: Mi nombre es Peardryad.

English: I hope everything goes well with you!
Spanish: ¡Espero que todo te vaya bien!

English: I will give you a seedling if you bring me leaves.
Spanish: Te daré un brote si me traes hojas.

English: I will give you a Pine Tree if you bring me 1,000 leaves.
Spanish: Te daré un Pino si me traes 1,000 hojas.

English: My name is Pinedryad.
Spanish: Mi nombre es Pinedryad.

English: I hope everything goes well with you!
Spanish: ¡Espero que todo te vaya bien!

English: Raising your own pet takes patience and dedication. Are you ready?
Spanish: Criar a tu propia mascota requiere paciencia y dedicación. ¿Estás listo?

English: ROOOARRR!! \nSorry... I was just practicing my tiger call. \nDo you have a pet? I love pets, it's what I live for!
Spanish: ¡Rawr! ¡Rawr! \nPerdona, solo estaba practicando mi rugido de tigre. \n¿Tienes una mascota? ¡Me encantan las mascotas, me alegran la vida!

English: I come from a long line of Pet Tamers. My family has been taming pets for generations and I am the best Pet tamer among them. Feel free to visit me if you ever need help with your pet.
Spanish: Vengo de una larga línea de Domadores de Mascotas. Mi familia ha estado domesticando mascotas durante generaciones y yo soy el mejor Domador de Mascotas de todos. No dudes en visitarme si necesitas ayuda con tu mascota.

English: Don't forget to feed your pet!
Spanish: ¡No te olvides de alimentar a tu mascota!

English: Step right up, champions! Welcome to the Chip Emporium!
Spanish: ¡Adelante, campeones! ¡Bienvenido al Emporio de Chip!

English: Heya stranger! If your guild wins the Guild Siege, you will be awarded Chips for your victory. The armor sets I sell here in my shop are absolutely the best you can find! So, how many Red Chips do you have, hmmm?
Spanish: ¡Oye, extranjero! Si tu gremio gana el Asedio de Gremios, recibirás Fichas por tu victoria. ¡Los conjuntos de armaduras que vendo aquí en mi tienda son absolutamente los mejores que puedes encontrar! Entonces, ¿Cuántas Fichas Rojas tienes, hmmm?

English: I am Waforu, the Battle Merchant. I've had my share of victories in the sieges, but I'm getting to old for that sort of thing. I still love the competition, however, so I decided to stay in the business and offer my services as a Red Chip Vendor.
Spanish: Soy Waforu, el Mercader de Batalla. He tenido mi ración de victorias en los asedios, pero me estoy haciendo viejo para ese tipo de cosas. Sin embargo, me encanta la competencia, así que decidí permanecer en el negocio y ofrecer mis servicios como proveedor de Fichas Rojas.

English: So long, contender. May Rhisis be with you.
Spanish: Hasta luego, contendiente. Que Rhisis te acompañe.

English: You don't want me in that arena. I'll bury you!
Spanish: No me quieres en esa arena. ¡Te enterraré!

English: You know, most people simply don't understand that settling differences occasionally requires more than just petty talk. Sometimes, it requires a knuckle sandwich!
Spanish: Sabes, la mayoría de la gente simplemente no entiende que resolver las diferencias ocasionalmente requiere más que una mera charla insignificante. ¡A veces, requiere un sándwich de nudillos!

English: My name is Harold and I run this arena, so don't cross me or it's your head! If you wish to leave the arena, just speak with me again.
Spanish: Mi nombre es Harold y dirijo esta arena, ¡así que no pases o pagarás con tu cabeza! Si deseas salir de la arena, vuelve a hablar conmigo.

English: Oh, burn! He took that one right to the face! It's a slobber-knocker!
Spanish: ¡Oh, duele! ¡Se lo llevó directo a la cara! ¡Es una aldaba de babas!

English: Anyone need any supplies? I got what YOU need!
Spanish: ¿Alguien necesita suministros? ¡Tengo lo que TÚ necesitas!

English: Once you step foot into the arena circle, you can be attacked by anyone at anytime, so watch your back!
Spanish: Una vez que pongas un pie en el círculo de la arena, cualquiera puede atacarte en cualquier momento, ¡así que vigila tu espalda!

English: Nice to meet you, friend. My name is Deek and I sell various foods, Posters, MP recovery items, and Arrows. Let me know if you need anything.
Spanish: Un placer conocerte amigo. Mi nombre es Deek y vendo varias Comidas, Pósters, artículos de recuperación de MP y Flechas. Avísame si necesitas algo.

English: Feel free to visit me again if you need some more supplies for the arena!
Spanish: ¡No dudes en visitarme de nuevo si necesitas más suministros para la arena!

English: New to Madrigal? Visit your friendly neighborhood Buff Pang!
Spanish: ¿Nuevo en Madrigal? ¡Visita a tus amigables vecinos Buff Pang!

English: Hello there! I'm granting buffs to adventurers who haven't completed their second job change yet. Come see me anytime if you ever find yourself in need of a boost to your stats!
Spanish: ¡Hola! Estoy otorgando buffs a los aventureros que aún no han completado su segundo cambio de clase. ¡Ven a verme en cualquier momento si necesitas mejorar tus estadísticas!

English: I am a Buff Pang. There are several of us throughout Madrigal and we are here to help adventurers by applying bonuses to their combat statistics. Are you in need of a buff, my friend?
Spanish: Soy un Buff Pang. Somos varios en Madrigal y estamos aquí para ayudar a los aventureros aplicando bonificaciones a sus estadísticas de combate. ¿Necesitas un buff, amigo?

English: Enjoy your stay in Madrigal!
Spanish: ¡Disfruta de tu estancia en Madrigal!

English: Hey, you two! Stop that bickering, it's pointless! Take it to the arena!
Spanish: ¡Eh, vosotros dos! ¡Dejar de discutir, no tiene sentido! ¡Discutirlo en la arena!

English: In the PvP arena, you can fight other adventurers such as yourself. If you meet unfortunate circumstances, and are slain on the arena floor, you will not incur any death penalties.
Spanish: En la arena PvP, puedes luchar contra otros aventureros como tú. Si te encuentras en la circunstancia desafortunada de ser asesinado en la arena, no incurrirá en ninguna pena de muerte.

English: My name is Lay and I am in charge of the PvP arena. I'll only let you in if you've chosen your first job.
Spanish: Mi nombre es Lay y estoy a cargo de la arena PvP. Solo te dejaré entrar si has elegido tu primera clase.

English: Another one bites the dust!
Spanish: ¡Y otro que muerde el polvo!

English: Why don't you sign up for a Madrigal tournament right away? Prove you are the best.
Spanish: Why don't you sign up for a Madrigal tournament right away? Prove you are the best.

English: Madrigal Tournament is about to begin. Hurry, to the arena!
Spanish: Madrigal Tournament is about to begin. Hurry, to the arena!

English: Would you like to take a bet on who will win this tournament?
Spanish: Would you like to take a bet on who will win this tournament?

English: The odds have been released. Check the payout for the team you bet on.
Spanish: The odds have been released. Check the payout for the team you bet on.

English: Only the strongest of guilds can achieve victory in the Secret Room!
Spanish: ¡Solo los Gremios más fuertes pueden lograr la victoria en la Sala Secreta!

English: If your guild is top ranked in the Secret Room, you will receive weekly rewards!
Spanish: Si tu Gremio queda primero en la Sala secreta, ¡Recibirás recompensas semanales!

English: Hello, adventurer! I'm in charge of the Secret Room and the Forsaken Tower. If you have any questions about this heroic challenge, please don't hesitate to ask.
Spanish: ¡Hola, aventurero! Estoy a cargo de la Sala Secreta y la Torre Abandonada. Si tiene alguna pregunta sobre este heroico desafío, no dude en preguntar.

English: May Rhisis guide you, and be with you, young one.
Spanish: Que Rhisis te guíe y te acompañe, jovenzuelo.

English: If you need any piercing cards converted, I'm your gal!
Spanish: Si necesitas convertir alguna carta de piercing, ¡soy tu chica!

English: Welcome, adventurer! If you have 10 piercing cards, I will attempt to convert the 10 that you give me into 1 card of the next level. I can't offer any guarantees, however, as sometimes you may only lose your cards.
Spanish: ¡Bienvenido, aventurero! Si tienes 10 cartas de piercing, intentaré convertir las 10 que me das en 1 carta del siguiente nivel. Sin embargo, no puedo ofrecer ninguna garantía, ya que a veces solo perderás tus cartas.

English: I'm the Card Master. After hearing about all the wonderful cards being thrown away, I decided to offer my services to the city of Flarine.
Spanish: Soy la Maestra de Cartas. Después de enterarme de que se tiraron todas las maravillosas cartas, decidí ofrecer mis servicios a la ciudad de Flarine.

English: Stop by anytime, my friend.
Spanish: Pásate cuando quieras, amigo.

English: Would anyone like a jewel crafted or perhaps a jewelry setting created?
Spanish: ¿Alguien quiere crear una gema o que la use para hacer una mejora?

English: Hi there! I offer jewelry services to the citizens of Flarine and create and set jewels for those wishing to modify their Rare Weapons. I also remove blessings and level reductions from items, among other things!
Spanish: ¡Hola! Ofrezco servicios relacionados con la gemas a los ciudadanos de Flarine, creo y uso gemas para aquellos que desean modificar sus Armas Raras. ¡También elimino las bendiciones y las reducciones de nivel de los objetos, entre otras cosas!

English: My name is Peach! I'm here to assist Boboku and help supplement his upgrading business. Stop by anytime!
Spanish: ¡Mi nombre es Peach! Estoy aquí para ayudar a Boboku y complementar su negocio con las mejoras. ¡Visítame cuando quieras!

English: Take care. Remember, for anything to do with jewels, I'm your girl!
Spanish: Cuídate. Recuerda, para cualquier cosa relacionada con gemas, ¡soy tu chica!

English: Attention everyone! We are looking for new Mentors. I will get you started on your way to becoming a Mentor!
Spanish: ¡Atención a todos! Buscamos nuevos Mentores. ¡Te ayudaré a comenzar tu camino para convertirte en Mentor!

English: Come see me if you want to become a Mentor.
Spanish: Ven a verme si quieres convertirte en Mentor.

English: It is not easy to find worthy people to walk the path of a Mentor, it isn't for everyone.
Spanish: No es fácil encontrar personas dignas de recorrer el camino de un Mentor, no es para todos.

English: Good afternoon. My name is Inisis. I am the current Mentor Teacher in Madrigal, well, not for much longer.
Spanish: Buenas tardes. Mi nombre es Inisis. Soy la actual Mentora Maestra de Madrigal, bueno, no por mucho más tiempo.

English: Come back and see me if you are interested in becoming a Mentor.
Spanish: Vuelve a verme si estás interesado en convertirte en Mentor.

English: What kind of hair style do you want? I can make all hair styles according to your taste.
Spanish: ¿Qué tipo de peinado quieres? Puedo hacer cualquier peinado a tu gusto.

English: I'm Demian. I am the Rock, Paper, Scissors Champion!
Spanish: Soy Demian. ¡El Campeón de Piedra, Papel y Tijeras!

English: There always is a challenger.
Spanish: Siempre hay un retador.

English: I will gain my revenge!
Spanish: ¡Me vengaré!

English: Rock!! Paper!! Scissors!!
Spanish: ¡¡Piedra!! ¡¡Papel!! ¡¡Tijeras!!

English: Hey, would you like to be Madrigal's Savior?
Spanish: Oye, ¿te gustaría ser el Salvador de Madrigal?

English: Iblis' power is reviving!
Spanish: ¡El poder de Iblis está reviviendo!

English: Who am I? You will see. By the way, would you like to be a hero?
Spanish: ¿Quién soy? Ya lo verás. Por cierto, ¿te gustaría ser un héroe?

English: Saviors of Madrigal!!! Come With Me!
Spanish: ¡¡¡Salvadores de Madrigal!!! ¡Venid conmigo!

English: HEY! YOU!! COME ON!!!
Spanish: ¡OYE! ¡¡TÚ!! ¡¡¡VENGA YA!!!

English: Ghosts are nothing to be scared of!!!! I'm a super duper hero just like Kooro!
Spanish: ¡¡¡Los fantasmas no son nada de lo que temer!!! ¡Soy un superhéroe super guay como Kooro!

English: I'm Nerco. I will be the Hero of Saint City just like Kooro!!! You better be good to me!!
Spanish: Soy Nerco ¡¡¡Seré el Héroe de Saint igual que Kooro!!! ¡¡Será mejor que seas bueno conmigo!!

English: Good bye! You must come back and see me.
Spanish: ¡Adiós! Tienes que volver a verme.

English: I can't remember anything...
Spanish: No puedo recordar nada...

English: What? You want to say something?
Spanish: ¿Qué? ¿Quieres decir algo?

English: I'm Hael. Suddenly, there are lots of monsters.. Something really bad is gonna happen, I can feel it.
Spanish: Soy Hael. De repente, hay muchos monstruos... Algo muy malo va a pasar, puedo sentirlo.

English: What is going on???!!!!
Spanish: ¡¡¡¡¿¿¿Qué está pasando???!!!!

English: Phew.. I can't even rest cause of my son... you'll regret this!!!
Spanish: Uf... ni siquiera puedo descansar por lo de mi hijo... ¡te arrepentirás!

English: Do you really know my mother's mind adventurer?
Spanish: ¿De verdad conoces la mente aventurera de una madre como yo?

English: Hello, I'm Luzina! Don't you know? I'm mother of the year!
Spanish: ¡Hola, soy Luzina! ¿No lo sabes? ¡Soy la madre del año!

English: Nerco is gone! That kid is such a troublemaker!
Spanish: ¡Nerco se ha ido! ¡Este chico es muy problemático!

English: My hair scrunchie is gone. It's because of you!
Spanish: Mi coletero ha desaparecido. ¡Es por tu culpa!

English: I lost my favorite hair scrunchie. What should I do?
Spanish: He perdido mi coletero favorito. ¿Qué puedo hacer?

English: I'm Nersha. I'm Nerco's sister, but I'm different, I swear! I'm not the trouble maker he is!
Spanish: Soy Nersha. Soy la hermana de Nerco, pero soy diferente, ¡lo juro! ¡No soy problematica cómo él!

English: Please do me a favor! I lost my favorite hair scrunchie!
Spanish: ¡Por favor, hazme un favor! ¡He perdido mi coletero favorito!

English: IBLIS! He cursed me! Whyyyyyy?!?
Spanish: ¡IBLIS! ¡Me ha maldecido! ¿¡¿Por quéeeeee?!?

English: I was a famous hero! Don't judge me by my looks, I was quite the dashing lad back in my day! What? You don't believe me?! I'm serious, my name was Samuel!
Spanish: ¡Yo era un héroe famoso! No me juzgues por mi apariencia, ¡yo era un chico bastante apuesto en mi época! ¿Qué? ¡¿No me crees?! Lo digo en serio, ¡mi nombre era Samuel!

English: My name is Reodos. You cannot even imagine how great I was. I look like this because of Iblis' curse!
Spanish: Mi nombre es Reodos. Ni siquiera puedes imaginar lo genial que era. ¡Tengo esta apariencia por culpa de la maldición de Iblis!

English: I wish to lift this curse.
Spanish: Deseo eliminar esta maldición.

English: How could Iblis' monsters be strong like this? They're getting stronger too!
Spanish: ¿Cómo pueden los monstruos de Iblis ser tan fuertes? ¡Se están volviendo más fuertes!

English: I'm searching for information as to what is going on in the Garden of Rhisis.
Spanish: Estoy buscando información sobre lo que está sucediendo en el Jardín de Rhisis.

English: I'm Handel. I'd like to know why Iblis' monster are around even though Iblis is gone.
Spanish: Soy Handel. Me gustaría saber por qué los monstruos de Iblis están por aquí a pesar de que Iblis ya no está.

English: There are lots of monsters in the Garden of Rhisis.
Spanish: Hay muchos monstruos en el Jardín de Rhisis.

English: Phew. Hero..what a busy job.
Spanish: Fiu. Héroe... qué trabajo tan ajetreado.

English: Too busy! It's hard to help everyone!!! Hey! What are you looking at?!
Spanish: ¡Demasiado ocupado! ¡¡¡Es difícil ayudar a todos!!! ¡Oye! ¡¿Qué estás mirando?!

English: I'm Zoro! When someone needs help, I'll be there... I think.
Spanish: ¡Soy Zoro! Cuando alguien necesite ayuda, allí estaré. Creo.

English: You need to find something that is worthwhile.
Spanish: Necesitas encontrar algo que valga la pena.

English: Bad boys! They are destroying the forest. Mother nature does not deserve that kind of treatment!
Spanish: ¡Chicos malos! Están destruyendo el bosque. ¡La Madre naturaleza no merece ese tipo de trato!

English: Oh, Darkon is already a desolated place. Darkon will become a desolated desert if they continue to do so.
Spanish: Oh, Darkon ya es un lugar desolado. Darkon se convertirá en un desierto desolado si continúan haciéndolo.

English: I'm Elaine, I'm the leader of the Darkon Clear Blue!
Spanish: ¡Soy Elaine, soy el líder de Darkon Azul Claro!

English: A healthy Mother nature is the most important for us all. But alas, it seems no one understands.
Spanish: Una Madre naturaleza sana es lo más importante para todos nosotros. Pero, por desgracia, parece que nadie lo entiende.

English: Nobody can follow me up here. They know what beauty is! Hahahah!
Spanish: Nadie puede seguirme hasta aquí. ¡Saben lo que es la belleza! ¡Jajaja!

English: I'm exploring the Dekane Dungeon to do important research. Geez you really are annoying!
Spanish: Estoy explorando la Mazmorra Dekane para hacer una investigación importante. Caray, ¡eres realmente pesado!

English: I'm Ainher, revival of Psykeeper hero~Hoho~ I know I'm perfect!!
Spanish: Soy Ainher, resurgimiento de la Héroe Psykeeper ~Hoho~ ¡¡Ya sé que soy perfecta!!

English: I'm busy, so, can you please get out of my sight and stop bothering me?
Spanish: Estoy ocupada, así que, ¿puedes por favor salir de mi vista y dejar de molestarme?

English: Last lesson.. This is the last..
Spanish: Última lección... Esta es la última...

English: Begone with you! I really need to focus. I can get what I wanted to learn from this very last lesson.
Spanish: ¡¡Lárgate!! Necesito concentrarme. Puedo aprender lo que quería de esta última lección.

English: Sury, that's my name. Now please, leave me alone.
Spanish: Sury, ese es mi nombre. Venga, ahora, lárgate de aquí.

English: It's hard to get... Inner realization.
Spanish: Es difícil de conseguir... Realización interna...

English: Hmm.. I can smell.. Ore.. Hey! Did you see a shining Ore?
Spanish: Hmm... Puedo oler... Mineral... ¡Oye! ¿Has visto un Mineral brillante?

English: What? You want what??
Spanish: ¿Qué? ¿¿Qué quieres??

English: I'm Drico, second son of Nevil. I don't care why you are here, but you should be really careful around here.
Spanish: Soy Drico, segundo hijo de Nevil. Me da igual por qué hayas venido, pero deberías ir con mucho cuidado por aquí.

English: Go back to where you from, you human!!
Spanish: ¡¡Vuelve por donde has venido, humano!!

English: Hello my name is Yao-Rin.
Spanish: Hola, mi nombre es Yao-Rin.

English: Oh! you are not the group of prophetic elected officials we have been waiting for. Leave.
Spanish: ¡Oh! Tú no eres del grupo de los oficiales proféticos elegidos que hemos estado esperando. Vete.

English: I am the fortune teller of the MewMew people.
Spanish: Soy la adivina del pueblo MewMew.

English: Good luck adventurer!
Spanish: ¡Buenas suerte aventurero!

English: Hello my name is Zaoma.
Spanish: Hola, mi nombre es Zaoma.

English: Oh really! you're not who I thought you were.
Spanish: ¡Oh, de verdad! No eres quien pensaba que eras.

English: I'm an old man.
Spanish: Soy un anciano.

English: Goodbye.
Spanish: Adiós.

English: Hello my name is Locku.
Spanish: Hola, mi nombre es Locku.

English: You are not our friend.
Spanish: Tú no eres nuestro amigo.

English: I am the leader of the MewMew people.
Spanish: Soy el Líder de la gente de MewMew.

English: Goodbye.
Spanish: Adiós.

English: Hi, I'm Letana.
Spanish: Hola, Soy Letana.

English: Locku has appointed me a MewMew hunter and I intend to honour him by supplying MewMew refugees with fresh game every day.
Spanish: Locku me ha nombrado cazadora de MewMew y tengo la intención de honrarle proporcionando a los refugiados de MewMew carne fresca todos los días.

English: I am the hunter of the MewMew people.
Spanish: Cazo para la gente de MewMew.

English: Goodbye and see you soon.
Spanish: Adiós, nos vemos pronto.

English: Ah! Life in a tent is harder than you think.
Spanish: ¡Ay! La vida en una tienda de campaña es más difícil de lo que piensas.

English: I am Nemra.
Spanish: Soy Nemra.

English: Goodbye. See you next time.
Spanish: Adiós y hasta la próxima.

English: You're coming with me to my tent?
Spanish: ¿Vienes conmigo a mi tienda?

English: I am the only makeup artist of Madrigal! I am also one of the guides in Flarine City. If you need any help or information, just ask me!
Spanish: ¡Soy la única maquilladora de Madrigal! También soy una de las guías de Flarine. Si necesitas ayuda o información, ¡Pregúntame!

English: Who wants some makeup? I am a pro!
Spanish: ¿Quién quiere un poco de maquillaje? ¡Soy una profesional!

English: You seem to me very tired, look at that messy hair! How about a little cut?
Spanish: ¡Pareces muy cansado, mira ese pelo despeinado! ¿Qué tal un pequeño corte?

English: I am the only hairdresser of Madrigal! I am open all the day.
Spanish: ¡Soy la única peluquera de Madrigal! Tengo abierto todo el dia.

English: Come back anytime you want!
Spanish: ¡Vuelve cuando quieras!

English: Durandil swords are really great, too bad you can't mine with them...
Spanish: Las espadas de Durandil son geniales, lástima que no puedas picar con ellas...

English: I am Dekane, the creator of this mine.
Spanish: Soy Dekane, el creador de esta mina.

English: I like brave people like you! Here is the key that seals the door to the secret room. Good luck!
Spanish: ¡Me gustan las personas valientes como tú! Aquí está la llave que sella la puerta de la habitación secreta. ¡Buena suerte!

English: It's true that defeating a dragon is not an easy task for an adventurer. Come and try your luck again when you have completed the quest #bThe bottom of the mine#nb.
Spanish: Es cierto que derrotar a un dragón no es tarea fácil para un aventurero. Ven y vuelve a probar suerte cuando hayas completado la misión #bEn lo profundo de la mina#nb.

English: See you bye bye!
Spanish: ¡Adiós, nos vemos!

English: Hello, what are you doing here?\n1.[Fight Meteonyker][IDS_NPC_Meteo]. \n2.[Who are you?][IDS_NPC_Dekane].
Spanish: Hola, ¿qué estás haciendo aquí?\n1.[Desafiar a Meteonyker][IDS_NPC_Meteo]. \n2.[¿Quién eres tú?][IDS_NPC_Dekane].

English: I am Dekane, the creator of this mine. Now that you've proven yourself, I'll be able to tell you the real problem at the bottom of the mine.
Spanish: Soy Dekane, el creador de esta mina. Ahora que has probado tu valía, podré contarte el verdadero problema que hay al final de la mina.

In a secret room sleep dragons from ancient times created by Shade ages ago. To defeat them, you'll need a well armed team. English: Sorry but you are not rich enough.
Spanish: Lo siento, pero no eres lo suficientemente rico.

English: It's alright, young successor. Only the bravest of souls can hope to stand against the strong Meteonyker. We'll keep him imprisoned here until the right person is ready to face him.
Spanish: Está bien, joven sucesor. Solo las almas más valientes pueden enfrentarse al gran Meteonyker. Lo mantendremos encarcelado aquí hasta que la persona adecuada esté lista para desafiarlo.

English: There are other brave souls locked in fierce combat with Meteonyker at the moment. Their deaths will be swift. You must wait.
Spanish: En este momento hay otras almas valientes luchando en un feroz combate contra Meteonyker. Sus muertes serán rápidas. Debes esperar.

English: You defeated Meteonyker? Excellent work, successor!
Spanish: ¿Has derrotado al Meteonyker? ¡Excelente trabajo, sucesor!

English: Welcome! Don't forget to complete quests, they give many #bexperience and rewards#nb! Hope you will enjoy the game!
Spanish: ¡Bienvenido! ¡No te olvides de completar las misiones, dan mucha #bexperiencia y recompensas#nb! ¡Espero que disfrutes del juego!

English: Who goes there?
Spanish: ¿Quien anda ahí?

English: I am Gigaka! Protector of these lands.
Spanish: ¡Soy Gigaka! Protector de estas tierras.

English: Watch yourself.
Spanish: Ve con cuidado.

English: Welcome to Azria!
Spanish: ¡Bienvenido a Azria!

English: Stay safe out there, traveler.
Spanish: Mantente a salvo ahí fuera, viajero.

English: Stay safe.
Spanish: Mantente a salvo.

English: Hm... Yes...
Spanish: Hmm... Si...

English: May Rhisis be with you.
Spanish: Que Rhisis te acompañe.

English: You should not be here...
Spanish: No deberías estar aquí...

English: Volkane is an ancient and once forgotten cavern in the depths of Magmient. The air is filled with volcanic ash and hot gases. This is no place for you.
Spanish: Volkane es una caverna antigua y olvidada en las profundidades de Magmient. El aire está lleno de ceniza volcánica y gases calientes. No es lugar para ti.

English: A traveler? In this place? Oh my.
Spanish: ¿Un viajero? ¿En este lugar? ¡Dios mío!

English: Hm.
Spanish: Humm.

English: This is no place for travelers. You must leave if you value your life.
Spanish: Este no es lugar para viajeros. Debes irte, si valoras tu vida.

English: The name's Buur! I love crystals more than anything. I can't get enough crystals. There is no such thing as too many crystals.
Spanish: ¡El nombre es Buur! Adoro los cristales por encima de todo. Nunca son suficientes cristales. No existen demasiados cristales.

English: I love crystals but they are so hard to come by. You can only get crystals by defeating a masquerpet here.
Spanish: Me encantan los cristales, pero son muy difíciles de conseguir. Solo obtienes cristales al derrotar a un masquerpet aquí.

English: You like crystals right? No way! Me too! I honestly can't believe it. We both like crystals!
Spanish: Te gustan los cristales ¿Verdad? ¡De ninguna manera! ¡A mí también! Sinceramente, no puedo creerlo. ¡A ambos nos gustan los cristales!

English:
You are ready to challenge the Red Meteonyker. Are you sure you would like to enter?
[Yes][IDS_NPC_Yes_Enter] / [No][IDS_NPC_No_Enter]

#cffff0000All the party members participating must be close to you to enter.#nc

Estás listo para desafiar al Meteonyker Rojo. ¿Está seguro de que desea participar?
[Sí][IDS_NPC_Yes_Enter] / [No][IDS_NPC_No_Enter]

#cffff0000Todos los miembros del grupo participantes deben estar cerca de ti para poder entrar.#nc

English: You must go and speak with Kumah to forge the Volkane Key.
Spanish: Debes hablar con Kumah para forjar la Llave Volkane.

English: Hello I am Azria Pang, the oldest of the Pang brothers. We manage the Lodelights.
Spanish: Hola soy Azria Pang, la mayor de los hermanos Pang. Gestionamos las Lodelights.

English: #b#cff8a004fThe #cfff60000Level 80 Guild Siege Application Center #cff8a004fis open!#nc#nb
Spanish: #b#cff8a004fEl #cfff60000Centro de Aplicación de Asedio de Gremio de Nivel 80 #cff8a004f¡Esta abierto!#nc#nb

English: Good Luck!
Spanish: ¡Buena suerte!

English: #b#cff8a004fEnjoy the #cfff60000Level 60 Guild Siege #cff8a004fbefore your second class!#nc#nb
Spanish: #b#cff8a004f ¡Disfruta del #cfff60000Asedio del Gremio de Nivel 60 #cff8a004fantes de tu segunda clase!#nc#nb

English: With global warming, I’m gonna end up living in a freezer..
Spanish: Con el calentamiento global, terminaré viviendo en un congelador...

English: See you soon! At least if I still exist when you come back...
Spanish: ¡Nos vemos pronto! Si es que sigo vivo cuando vuelvas...

English: It is way too early for you... Come back when you reach the appropriate level!
Spanish: Es demasiado pronto para ti... ¡Vuelve cuando tengas el Nivel requerido!

English: Creatures are appearing from the Leren Chasm. We must stop them!
Spanish: Están apareciendo criaturas del Leren Chasm. ¡Debemos detenerlos!

English: Great strength will be required to survive within the Leren Chasm.
Spanish: Se requerirá una gran fuerza para sobrevivir dentro del Leren Chasm.

English: This place is far too dangerous.. leave now or you may get hurt.
Spanish: Este lugar es demasiado peligroso. Váyanse ahora o pueden lastimarse.

English: I am a Flarine guard, assigned my post here to protect passersby from entering the Leren Chasm.
Spanish: Soy un Guardia de Flarine, asigné mi puesto aquí para prevenir a los transeúntes de entrar en el Abismo Leren.

English: Farewell.. may you be safe from the dangers of Leren Chasm!
Spanish: Adiós... ¡Mantente lejos de los peligros en Leren Chasm!

English: Will this storm ever end?..
Spanish: ¿Terminará algñún día esta tormenta?..

English: You must have an iron will to survive the Rhisis Catacombs.
Spanish: Debes poseer voluntad de hierro para sobrevivir a las Catacumbas Rhisis.

English: These grounds are electrified.. return from where you can, less you be shocked.
Spanish: Estos terrenos están electrificados... regresa por donde has venido, para que no te sorprendas.

English: I hail from the noble ranks of Saint City's guardians, entrusted with the duty of safeguarding the Rhisis Catacombs from curious adventurers.
Spanish: Provengo de las nobles filas de los guardianes de Ciudad Santa, a quienes se les ha confiado el deber de salvaguardar las catacumbas de Rhisis.

English: Goodbye for now.. be safe from the storms!
Spanish: Hasta pronto... ¡Protégete de las tormentas!

English: How long as this palace been hidden within the Cave of Envy?
Spanish: ¿Cuánto tiempo ha estado escondido este palacio dentro de la Cueva de la Envidia?

English: Beware the masquerpets touched by waters of the Envy Depths.
Spanish: Cuidado con los masquerpets tocados por las aguas de las Profundidades de la Envidia.

English: Turn around while you still have some life left in you.. these waters are cursed.
Spanish: Date la vuelta mientras te quede algo de vida... estas aguas están malditas.

English: I am a guard hired by the Mayor of Darken City to ensure the safety of adventurers who wander too close to the Envy Depths.
Spanish: Soy un Guardia contratado por el alcalde de Ciudad Oscura para proteger a los aventureros que se acercan a las Profundidades de la Envidia.

English: Tell those who are weak to avoid the Envy Depths at all costs!
Spanish: ¡Dile a los débiles que eviten las Profundidades de la Envidia a toda costa!

English: The heart of the Guardiane Sanctuary has been torn asunder!
Spanish: ¡El corazón del Santuario de Guardianes ha sido desgarrado!

English: Death and decay are all that remain within the Guardiane Sanctuary..
Spanish: Muerte y decadencia es todo lo que queda en del Santuario de Guardianes.

English: Escape this place before you are turned into the living dead like those poor souls.
Spanish: Escapa de este lugar antes de convertirte en un muerto viviente, como esas pobres almas.

English: I was sent here to guard the entrance of the Guardiane Sanctuary.. hopefully the Purple Magician does not come back.
Spanish: Me enviaron aquí para proteger la entrada del Santuario de Guardianes... espero que el Mago Púrpura no regrese.

English: May the heart of Guardiane be one day restored!
Spanish: ¡Que el corazón de Guardianes sea restaurado algún día!

English: Something strange is in the mountain air of Storm Peak..
Spanish: Algo extraño hay en el aire de la montaña de Pico Tormentoso..

English: Within the Storm Peak mountain a great evil is said to lurk.
Spanish: Se dice que dentro de la montaña Pico Tormentoso, acecha un gran mal.

English: Go back home before you get frostbite!
Spanish: ¡Vuelve a casa antes de que te congeles!

English: I've watched over the Storm Peak mountain trails for many years, ensuring the safety of all who venture forth.
Spanish: He vigilado los senderos de montaña Pico Tormentoso por muchos años, garantizando la seguridad de todos.

English: One day you will see, that the Frostiae peak ahead holds a dark secret.
Spanish: Un día verás que el Pico Escarcha de más adelante, guarda un oscuro secreto.

English: Azria Mine
Spanish: Mina Azria

English: I shouldn't say anything, but there are other mines abandoned around Madrigal that contain power even stronger than that within Dekane. One of those mines is hidden in the mountains of Azria.
Spanish: No debería decir nada, pero hay otras minas abandonadas alrededor de Madrigal que contienen un poder aún más fuerte que el de Dekane. Una de esas minas está escondida en las montañas de Azria.

English: My name is Rankashu, and my ancestors have lived in the mountains of Darkon long before you creatures ever showed up. And no.. I am not one of those stuck up High-Dwarpets.
Spanish: Mi nombre es Rankashu, y mis antepasados han vivido en las montañas de Darkon mucho antes de que aparecieran ustedes, criaturas. Y no... no soy uno de esos High-Dwarpets engreídos.

English: My people are all gone.. I am alone here.
Spanish: Mi gente se ha ido .. Estoy solo aquí.

English: I have lived here for what feels like an eternity collecting materials that may one day save Madrigal.
Spanish: He vivido aquí por una eternidad recolectando materiales que algún día podrían salvar a Madrigal.

English: No one should be here.. leave before you are killed.
Spanish: Nadie debería estar aquí... vete antes de que te maten.

English: My name is Rankashin.. I have lived here for many years now. Long ago I helped build a powerful weapon, but in the end it was turned against us..
Spanish: Mi nombre es Rankashin. He vivido aquí por muchos años. Hace mucho, ayudé a construir un arma poderosa, pero al final se volvió contra nosotros...

English: May the Clockworks War never be forgotten!
Spanish: ¡Que la Guerra de los Mecanismos nunca sea olvidada!

English: Hi I am Kebaras Pang, the strongest of the Pang brothers. We manage the Lodelights.
Spanish: Hola, soy Kebaras Pang, el más fuerte de los hermanos Pang. Gestionamos las Lodelights.

English: Cursed Symbol
Spanish: Símbolo Maldito

English: I can feel the dark power radiating from your bag.. you have one of the symbols of corruption, don't you? Hand it to me if you don't mind.
Spanish: Puedo sentir el poder oscuro que irradia tu bolso... tienes uno de los símbolos de la corrupción, ¿no? Dámelo si no te importa.

English: Give the Symbol
Spanish: Dar el Símbolo

English: The past few years have felt like a blur to me. I wrote this letter to an old friend, but I can't remember who..
Spanish: Los últimos años han sido borrosos. Le escribí esta carta a un viejo amigo, pero no recuerdo quién...

English: IDS_Hael_Letter
Spanish: IDS_Carta_Hael

English: Though Hael has gained back some memories of his past, it saddens me that he has forgotten so much. Thank you for bringing me his letter.
Spanish: Aunque Hael ha recuperado algunos recuerdos de su pasado, me entristece que haya olvidado tantas cosas. Gracias por traerme su carta.

English: Give Letter
Spanish: Dar la Carta

English: This letter is fascinating.. apparently Hael began to lose his memory after a series of strange encounters with odd creatures along his travels. And look.. there's a map here.
Spanish: Esta carta es fascinante... aparentemente Hael comenzó a perder la memoria después de una serie de encuentros con extrañas criaturas a lo largo de sus viajes. Y mira... hay un mapa aquí.

English: You are a rare specimen. Not like other humans I see. Speak with me once more and I will show you a secret..
Spanish: Eres un espécimen raro. No como otros humanos que veo. Habla conmigo otra vez y te mostraré un secreto..

English: Wow, you found my favorite trinket! If you had a map, I could show you where something special is hidden..
Spanish: ¡Vaya, encontraste mi baratija favorita! Si tuvieras un mapa, podría mostrarte dónde se esconde algo especial.

English: I love rare trinkets! My favorite trinket drops from a cute one-eyed bat..
Spanish: ¡Me encantan las baratijas raras! Mi baratija favorita cae de un lindo murciélago tuerto.

English: You've been touched by an incredible amount of purple magic. It's good that you found me before you became one of them..
Spanish: Te ha tocado una cantidad increíble de magia púrpura. Es bueno que me hayas encontrado antes de convertirte en uno de ellos.

English: It's not too late to save your mind of corruption, but we must act quickly. To cleanse shade's aura from your body I'll need a stone blessed by angels and a powerful elixir that can cure disease.
Spanish: No es demasiado tarde para salvar su mente de la corrupción, pero debemos actuar rápido. Para limpiar el aura de sombra de tu cuerpo necesitaré una piedra bendecida por ángeles y un elixir poderoso que pueda curar enfermedades.

English: Ah! You've brought everything needed to cleanse the evil from your body, just in time, too! In fact, there's enough here to create a second elixir of cleansing.. perhaps it will be useful in your travels.
Spanish: ¡Ah! ¡Has traído todo lo necesario para limpiar el mal de tu cuerpo, justo a tiempo! De hecho, aquí hay suficiente para crear un segundo elixir de limpieza... quizás te sea útil en tus viajes.

English: Who is gonna attend the #bfinals in Manila#nb and win the #bFlyff World Championship 2025#nb? Prove that you are the best!
Spanish: Who is gonna attend the #bfinals in Manila#nb and win the #bFlyff World Championship 2025#nb? Prove that you are the best!

English: Welcome, competitor! I am Ava, the manager of the Flyff World Championship. I will trade you the best equipment you can get to win the competition!
Spanish: ¡Bienvenido, competidor! Soy Ava, la directora del Campeonato Mundial Flyff. ¡Te cambiaré el mejor equipo que puedas conseguir para ganar la competencia!

English: Hm I can feel that you are the best PvE competitor! No, wait... Maybe PvP? Ha I don't know. Good luck!
Spanish: ¡Mmmm, puedo sentir que eres el mejor competidor PvE! No, espera... ¿Quizás PvP? Ja, no lo sé. ¡Buena suerte!

English: May the best win!
Spanish: ¡Que gane el mejor!

English: I am an automated machine intended to replace and eliminate humans. However, I am also designed to deliver rewards in exchange for coins.
Spanish: Soy una máquina automatizada destinada a reemplazar y eliminar a los humanos. Sin embargo, también estoy diseñado para entregar recompensas a cambio de monedas.

English: We will probably meet again, and I might have more items for you next time!
Spanish: ¡Probablemente nos volvamos a encontrar y es posible que tenga más artículos para ti la próxima vez!

English: Hi, I am Private Leo. I got separated from my group after entering this dungeon.
Spanish: Hola, soy el Leo Privado. Me separé de mi grupo después de entrar a esta mazmorra.

English: Thank you for saving me, I owe you one!
Spanish: ¡Gracias por salvarme, te debo una!

English: Let's get out of here!
Spanish: ¡Vamos a salir de aquí!

English: Collect some #bW-Token#nb from masquerpets and I will give you nice rewards!
Spanish: ¡Recoge algunos #bW-Token#nb de masquerpets y te daré bonitas recompensas!

English: Upgrade Costume Boxes with Repair Hammer that drops when you hunt a monster, and get various items!
Spanish: ¡Mejora las Cajas Atuendos con el Martillo Reparador, que suelta un monstruo, y obtén varios artículos!

English: I'm the guardian of The Wilds, a wild and savage realm. What brings you here?
Spanish: Soy el Guardia Los Salvajes, un reino salvaje y cruel. ¿Qué te trae por aquí?

English: Always another group thinking they can conquer 'The Wilds.' Let's see who comes out in one piece this time.
Spanish: Siempre hay otro grupo que piensa que pueden conquistar 'Los Salvajes'. A ver quién sale vivo esta vez.

English: Stay safe out there. Remember, not all who wander find their way back.
Spanish: Cuidate ahí fuera. Recuerda, no todos los que deambulan encuentran el camino de regreso.

English: A wise decision, my friend. You're about to embark on a journey that will carve your legend. Brace yourself, for the untamed awaits.
Spanish: Sabia decisión, amigo. Estás a punto de embarcarte en un viaje que forjará tu leyenda. Prepárate, porque lo indómito te espera.

English: Life's full of choices, and 'The Wilds' isn't for everyone. If you ever hunger for adventure, remember where I stand.
Spanish: La vida está llena de opciones y 'Los Salvajes' no es para todos. Si deseas una aventura, recuerda cuál es mi posición.

English: Interested in having your very own room?
Spanish: ¿Interesado en tener tu propia habitación?

English: You now have the opportunity to claim your own space! Invite a few friends or organize exclusive meetings with your guildmates.
Spanish: ¡Ahora tienes la oportunidad de reclamar tu propio espacio! Invita a algunos amigos u organiza reuniones exclusivas con tus compañeros de gremio.

English: I specialize in crafting top-notch furniture and other household items to adorn your room. I'm renowned as the finest carpenter around!
Spanish: Me especializo en elaborar muebles de primera calidad y otros artículos del hogar para adornar espacios. ¡Soy conocido como el mejor carpintero que existe!

English: Owning a splendid home can rejuvenate and fortify you for battles in Madrigal.
Spanish: Ser propietario de una casa espléndida puede rejuvenecerte y fortalecerte para las batallas en Madrigal.

English: Does your guild aspire to have its own house?
Spanish: ¿Tu gremio aspira a tener su propia casa?

English: Greetings! If you're interested in acquiring a guild house, you're in the right place. You'll need a guild with a minimum of 12 members.
Spanish: ¡Saludos! Si estás interesado en adquirir una casa gremial, estás en el lugar indicado. Necesitarás un gremio con un mínimo de 12 miembros.

English: Hello, my name is Lousiana, and I manage this ship.
Spanish: Hola, mi nombre es Lousiana y administro este barco.

English: Look who we have here on the vibrant shores of Coral Island! After all these years, fresh faces like yours bring a spark of excitement to my inventor's heart. With your helping hand, I just might accelerate the pace of my ingenious projects!
Spanish: ¡Mira a quién tenemos aquí en las vibrantes costas de Isla Coral! Después de todos estos años, caras nuevas como la suya traen una chispa de emoción a mi corazón de inventor. ¡Con tu ayuda, podría acelerar el ritmo de mis ingeniosos proyectos!

English: Hey there! It's a thrill to have you join our little island community! I'm on the brink of something revolutionary, and I need someone as creative and ambitious as you to help me build my next groundbreaking invention. Together, we can shape the destiny of Madrigal!
Spanish: ¡Hola! ¡Es emocionante que te unas a nuestra pequeña comunidad isleña! Estoy al borde de algo revolucionario y necesito que alguien tan creativo y ambicioso como tú me ayude a construir mi próximo invento innovador. ¡Juntos podemos dar forma al destino de Madrigal!

English: Building complex machinery is like crafting art - it takes time, patience, and vision. If you're intrigued by the world of invention and wish to collaborate in the future, know that I'll be here, ready to embark on electrifying ventures!
Spanish: Construir maquinaria compleja es como crear arte: requiere tiempo, paciencia y visión. Si está intrigado por el mundo de la invención y desea colaborar en el futuro, sepa que estaré aquí, listo para embarcarme en aventuras electrizantes.

English: Greetings, I'm Remi! A fervent inventor who can't resist the allure of gadgets and gizmos. Coral Island is my canvas, and I'm constantly conjuring up new marvels and tinkering with the unknown.
Spanish: Saludos ¡Soy Remi! Un inventor ferviente que no puede resistir el encanto de los aparatos y artilugios. Isla Coral es mi lienzo y constantemente estoy evocando nuevas maravillas y jugando con lo desconocido.

English: As you set forth on your adventures across this bewitching island, remember it's a realm of both beauty and peril. Be cautious, intrepid traveler, for the world of invention may be exhilarating, but Madrigal can be equally treacherous!
Spanish: Mientras emprendes tus aventuras por esta fascinante isla, recuerda que es un reino de belleza y de peligro. ¡Ten cuidado, viajero intrépido, porque el mundo de la invención puede ser estimulante, pero Madrigal puede ser traicionero!

English: Welcome to our charming Coral Island village! I've dedicated myself to mastering the culinary arts, conjuring delectable dishes with the island's finest ingredients.
Spanish: ¡Bienvenido a nuestro encantador pueblo Isla Coral! Me he dedicado a dominar las artes culinarias, conjurando platos deliciosos con los mejores ingredientes de la isla.

English: Oh, what a delight to have new and hungry souls to satiate! There's no greater joy for a chef like me than the smiles and satisfaction of full bellies.
Spanish: ¡Oh, qué delicia tener almas nuevas y hambrientas que saciar! No hay mayor alegría para un chef que las sonrisas y la satisfacción de tener el estómago lleno.

English: If you ever find yourself yearning for the extraordinary flavors that Coral Island has to offer, look no further. Come to me, and I'll whip up a tantalizing feast that'll leave your taste buds dancing! Rare food ingredients, you say? Consider it a delicious deal!
Spanish: Si alguna vez anhela los extraordinarios sabores que Isla Coral ofrece, no busque más. ¡Ven a mí y te prepararé un festín que dejará tus papilas gustativas bailando! ¿Ingredientes alimentarios raros, dices? ¡Considéralo una oferta deliciosa!

English: I'm Pau Pau, the culinary maestro of Coral Island. I've harnessed my love for cooking to nourish and cherish my friends here. May your time on this island be a banquet of delights, and may your travels be seasoned with happiness!
Spanish: Soy Pau Pau, el maestro culinario de Isla Coral. He aprovechado mi amor por la cocina para nutrir y apreciar a mis amigos aquí. ¡Que tu estancia en esta isla sea un banquete de delicias y que tus viajes estén sazonados de felicidad!

English: Keep those eyes wide open as you explore the island; you'll stumble upon a treasure trove of marvelous cooking ingredients. They're scattered like edible gems all around Coral Island, waiting for the discerning palates of adventurous souls like yours!
Spanish: Mantén esos ojos bien abiertos mientras exploras la Isla; Te toparás con un tesoro de maravillosos ingredientes para cocinar. ¡Están esparcidos por toda Isla Coral, esperando los paladares más exigentes de almas aventureras como la suya!

English: It's a real treat to have you grace our cozy little village. Our mail system hasn't been very active the past few years, but I have a hunch that things are about to change now that the island's mysterious mist has lifted!
Spanish: Es un verdadero placer que adornes nuestro pequeño y acogedor pueblo. Nuestro sistema de correo no ha estado muy activo en los últimos años, pero tengo el presentimiento de que las cosas están a punto de cambiar ahora que la misteriosa niebla de la isla se ha disipado.

English: You, my friend, are as sharp as a tack! It's no wonder the folks in this village put their faith in you. Your trustworthiness shines like a beacon.
Spanish: ¡Tú, amigo mío, eres tan listo como una tachuela! No es de extrañar que la gente de este pueblo confíe en ti. Tu confiabilidad brilla como un faro.

English: Coral Island is a haven, but peril lurks in the shadows. That's why we welcome outsiders like you with open arms. A helping hand from adventurers like you is always a ray of sunshine.
Spanish: Isla Coral es un paraíso, pero el peligro acecha en las sombras. Por eso damos la bienvenida a personas ajenas como usted. Una mano amiga de aventureros como tú siempre es un rayo de sol.

English: Greetings, greetings! I'm none other than your cheerful host, Sunny Pang. I'm here to make your island life a breeze. Whether it's sending heartwarming letters to friends, safeguarding your treasures in the bank, or just being the friendly face of our village, you can count on me!
Spanish: ¡Saludos, saludos! Soy su alegre anfitrión, Pang Soleado. Estoy aquí para hacer que tu vida en la isla sea sencilla. Ya sea enviando cartas a amigos, salvaguardando tus tesoros en el banco o simplemente siendo la cara amigable de nuestro pueblo, ¡Puedes contar conmigo!

English: Feel the warmth of Coral Island's embrace as you savor your stay, and rest assured, I'll be right here, ready to lend a helping flipper wherever I can. Enjoy the island, dear friend!
Spanish: Siente la calidez del abrazo de Isla Coral mientras saboreas tu estancia y ten la seguridad de que estaré aquí, listo para ayudarte siempre que pueda. ¡Disfruta de la isla, querido amigo!

English: Oh, what an absolute delight to welcome a visitor like you to our cozy village! Your presence warms my heart, and I hope that my humble wares bring a smile to your face.
Spanish: ¡Qué delicia recibir a un visitante como usted en nuestro acogedor pueblo! Tu presencia calienta mi corazón y espero que mis humildes productos te hagan sonreír.

English: We're deeply grateful for your kindness and support in helping our tight-knit community. Every bit of assistance is like a ray of sunshine on our village's path to prosperity.
Spanish: Estamos profundamente agradecidos por su amabilidad y apoyo al ayudar a nuestra comunidad. Cada pequeña ayuda es como un rayo de sol en el camino hacia la prosperidad.

English: Coral Island is a treasure trove of experiences waiting to be explored. Take your sweet time, immerse yourself in the lush jungles, and set sail on the boundless seas that surround this enchanting island.
Spanish: Isla Coral es un tesoro escondido de experiencias que esperan ser exploradas. Tómate tu tiempo, sumérgete en las exuberantes selvas y navega por los mares ilimitados que rodean esta encantadora isla.

English: I'm Kammie, your friendly neighborhood General Vendor. I make sure our village stays well-stocked with all the essentials our villagers and allies need to brave the wild frontiers of Coral Island.
Spanish: Soy Kammie, tu amigable vendedora del vecindario. Me aseguro de que nuestra aldea esté bien equipada con todos los elementos esenciales que nuestros aldeanos y aliados necesitan para desafiar las fronteras salvajes de Isla Coral.

English: Don't be a stranger, dear visitor! If there's ever anything you desire or require, do return for a visit. I'll be here with open arms and a collection of goods to make your heart flutter!
Spanish: ¡No sea un extraño, visitante! Si alguna vez desea o necesita algo, visíteme. ¡Estaré aquí con los brazos abiertos y una colección de productos para hacer latir su corazón!

English: Hohoho, this island is a treasure trove of enigmas and formidable beasts! If you seek the keys to ultimate power, you're in the right place. The secrets are out there for the taking.
Spanish: ¡Hohoho, esta isla es un tesoro escondido de enigmas y bestias formidables! Si buscas las claves para alcanzar el poder supremo, estás en el lugar correcto. Los secretos te esperan.

English: Your bravery is your greatest asset in the boundless adventures that Coral Island offers. May every experience on our extraordinary island be etched in your heart and memory!
Spanish: Tu valentía es tu mayor activo en las infinitas aventuras que ofrece Isla Coral. ¡Que cada experiencia en nuestra extraordinaria isla quede grabada en tu corazón y en tu memoria!

English: Know that you are always welcomed with open arms in our village, no matter how far your travels take you. Return to our cozy haven whenever you wish.
Spanish: Sepa que siempre será recibido con los brazos abiertos en nuestro pueblo, sin importar qué tan lejos lo lleven sus viajes. Regrese a nuestro acogedor refugio cuando lo desee.

English: Greetings, fellow adventurer! I'm BoBu, the mighty blacksmith of Coral Island village, and this little winged friend is Polly. Together, we forge the most potent armor for our villagers, and now, for our esteemed visitors like you!
Spanish: ¡Saludos, compañero aventurero! Soy BoBu, el poderoso herrero de la aldea Isla Coral, y esta pequeña amiga alada es Polly. ¡Juntos, forjamos la armadura más potente para nuestros aldeanos y para visitantes como usted!

English: Until we meet again, adventure. If you ever desire to fortify your armor or seek my expertise in the future, don't hesitate to return. Your safety and strength are my top priorities!
Spanish: Hasta que nos volvamos a encontrar, aventura. Si alguna vez deseas fortalecer tu armadura o me necesitas en el futuro, no dudes en regresar. ¡Tu seguridad y fuerza son mis principales prioridades!

English: Coral Island is a crucible of potent weapon technologies, born from the island's bountiful resources and our village's ingenious craftsmanship. Here, we shape the future of armaments!
Spanish: Isla Coral es un crisol de potentes tecnologías de armas, nacidas de los abundantes recursos de la isla y la ingeniosa artesanía de nuestra aldea. ¡Aquí damos forma al futuro de los armamentos!

English: Ah, I can see you're as keen as the sharpest of blades! It's an absolute pleasure to have you join us and collaborate on forging a path to greatness.
Spanish: ¡Ah, puedo ver que eres tan agudo como la espada más afilada! Es un absoluto placer que se una a nosotros y colabore para forjar un camino hacia la grandeza.

English: Remember, dreams are like trees. They bear fruit only when nurtured with determination and action.
Spanish: Recuerde, los sueños son como árboles. Sólo dan frutos cuando se los alimenta con determinación y acción.

English: Step into my workshop, my friend! I'm Talus, your weapon master at Coral Island village. I work endlessly to craft potent weapons for our village's protection and hunting needs.
Spanish: ¡Entra en mi taller, amigo! Soy Talus, tu maestro de armas en Isla Coral. Trabajo sin cesar para crear armas potentes para las necesidades de protección y caza de nuestra aldea.

English: Should the need arise for weapon enhancement or if you seek the craftsmanship of a true master, don't hesitate to return. I'm here to empower you on your journey!
Spanish: Si surge la necesidad de mejorar las armas o si buscas la artesanía de un verdadero maestro, no dudes en regresar. ¡Estoy aquí para empoderarte en tu viaje!

English: The elusive secrets of Ultimate power are concealed within the very heart of Coral Island, waiting to be unveiled.
Spanish: Los escurridizos secretos del poder supremo están ocultos en el corazón de Isla Coral, esperando ser revelados.

English: Should your determination remain steady, the day may dawn when the keys to Ultimate power are yours to wield.
Spanish: Si tu determinación se mantiene firme, puede llegar el día en que puedas manejar las llaves del poder supremo.

English: The journey to uncover the island's arcane mysteries lies before you, should you dare to embark upon it.
Spanish: El viaje para descubrir los misterios arcanos de la isla está ante ti, si te atreves a embarcarte en él.

English: My desire is to witness the revelation of Ultimate power in those who prove themselves worthy of such extraordinary gifts.
Spanish: Mi deseo es presenciar la revelación del poder Supremo en aquellos que demuestran ser dignos de dones tan extraordinarios.

English: Return to my side bearing the essence of Ultima, and in exchange, I shall bestow upon you a fragment of the unfathomable Ultimate power.
Spanish: Regresa a mi lado llevando la esencia de Ultima y, a cambio, te otorgaré un fragmento del insondable poder Supremo.

English: Happy New Year~!\nMay the new year of 2024 be full of fun adventures!
Spanish: ¡Feliz año nuevo~!\n¡Que el nuevo año 2024 esté lleno de divertidas aventuras!

English: Hi! I would like to ask you a favor, could you hear me out?
Spanish: Hi! I would like to ask you a favor, could you hear me out?

English: Have you heard of the rumor? The rumor that a blacksmith made a couple ring thinking only about his beloved until he died after losing her in an accident! When lovers put on the couple's ring and think about going to their lover, they fly to their lover in an instant, which is amazing, isn't it?
Spanish: Have you heard of the rumor? The rumor that a blacksmith made a couple ring thinking only about his beloved until he died after losing her in an accident! When lovers put on the couple's ring and think about going to their lover, they fly to their lover in an instant, which is amazing, isn't it?

English: Do you want to exit the dungeon?
Spanish: ¿Quieres salir de la mazmorra?

English: Did you know that the more you polish seashells in the sea, the more beautiful they become? I once saw seashells that were very highly polished. It was so beautiful.\nI know where I can get the materials I need to polish clams. Can you get the material there and polish the shells? It's dangerous, but it might be a great vacation for you
Spanish: Did you know that the more you polish seashells in the sea, the more beautiful they become? I once saw seashells that were very highly polished. It was so beautiful.\nI know where I can get the materials I need to polish clams. Can you get the material there and polish the shells? It's dangerous, but it might be a great vacation for you

English: It's the 20th anniversary of Flyff! How are you celebrating this lovely occasion? I'm going to be reminiscing, reading up on all kinds of history...
Spanish: It's the 20th anniversary of Flyff! How are you celebrating this lovely occasion? I'm going to be reminiscing, reading up on all kinds of history...

English: In order for me to give you a quest, all partners of your couple must be online!
Spanish: In order for me to give you a quest, all partners of your couple must be online!

English: I am Cupid, the messenger of love sent from the heavens. I've been dispatched to fill Madrigal with love. If you have someone you love, don't hesitate, confess your feelings using a ring!
Spanish: I am Cupid, the messenger of love sent from the heavens. I've been dispatched to fill Madrigal with love. If you have someone you love, don't hesitate, confess your feelings using a ring!

English: Hello there. Enjoying your life in Madrigal? If you wish to expand your horizons, come see me.
Spanish: Hello there. Enjoying your life in Madrigal? If you wish to expand your horizons, come see me.

English: Speaking of me, I'm a master of thousand crafts. Herbs, trees, ores, fish, anything you don't know about this world, ask me. I'll tell you all about it.
Spanish: Speaking of me, I'm a master of thousand crafts. Herbs, trees, ores, fish, anything you don't know about this world, ask me. I'll tell you all about it.

English: We reuse our food - of course joking!
Spanish: Reutilizamos nuestra comida. ¡Es broma, claro!

English: Hello there! I may have something useful for you. Would you mind taking a look in my bag?
Spanish: Hello there! I may have something useful for you. Would you mind taking a look in my bag?

English: I'm just walking around and selling stuff.
Spanish: I'm just walking around and selling stuff.

English: I don't know what items will be available when, so come back whenever you have time. Hehe
Spanish: I don't know what items will be available when, so come back whenever you have time. Hehe

English: Arrr, ye got that look in yer eye! Reminds me of when I was a young scallywag, barely old enough to tie me own boots. There I was, face to face with a storm that could sink the fiercest ship. But here I am, still breathin'! Takes a bit o' grit to survive out here, but I reckon ye've got what it takes.
Spanish: Arrr, ye got that look in yer eye! Reminds me of when I was a young scallywag, barely old enough to tie me own boots. There I was, face to face with a storm that could sink the fiercest ship. But here I am, still breathin'! Takes a bit o' grit to survive out here, but I reckon ye've got what it takes.

English: Ahoy! Captain Sovann, scourge o’ the seas of Madrigal! I’ve clashed blades and cannons in countless battles, and more than a few of 'em against the dark forces of Shade herself. Ain't many who could boast survivin’ such encounters! If there’s danger to face or treasure to seize, ye can bet ol' Sovann’s been there!
Spanish: Ahoy! Captain Sovann, scourge o’ the seas of Madrigal! I’ve clashed blades and cannons in countless battles, and more than a few of 'em against the dark forces of Shade herself. Ain't many who could boast survivin’ such encounters! If there’s danger to face or treasure to seize, ye can bet ol' Sovann’s been there!

English: As ye embark on yer journey through these treacherous waters and enchanted lands, remember Madrigal’s beauty is as deadly as it is mesmerizing. Stay sharp, bold traveler, for adventure may beckon, but danger lurks beneath every wave. Fare thee well, and may the tides favor ye till we cross paths again!
Spanish: As ye embark on yer journey through these treacherous waters and enchanted lands, remember Madrigal’s beauty is as deadly as it is mesmerizing. Stay sharp, bold traveler, for adventure may beckon, but danger lurks beneath every wave. Fare thee well, and may the tides favor ye till we cross paths again!

English: Ahoy! Fresh faces like yers bring new fire to these old sails. With a mate like ye, I just might find the spark for me next grand venture on the high seas!
Spanish: Ahoy! Fresh faces like yers bring new fire to these old sails. With a mate like ye, I just might find the spark for me next grand venture on the high seas!

English: Sailing the high seas is more than just a test of strengt it’s an art, a blend of courage, wit, and the call o’ the unknown. If yer heart yearns for the thrill of discovery and the clash of steel, know that I’ll be here, ready to welcome ye on ventures wild and grand!
Spanish: Sailing the high seas is more than just a test of strengt it’s an art, a blend of courage, wit, and the call o’ the unknown. If yer heart yearns for the thrill of discovery and the clash of steel, know that I’ll be here, ready to welcome ye on ventures wild and grand!

English: Uncover the secrets within the Revolutionary Journal, and great rewards await you
Spanish: Uncover the secrets within the Revolutionary Journal, and great rewards await you

English: I mean… what could really happen in a place this quiet? A short break won’t hurt, right?
Spanish: I mean… what could really happen in a place this quiet? A short break won’t hurt, right?

English: My name’s Doran. I’m an airport guard… though it’s honestly duller than I expected. You’re from across the sea, right? Seen anything interesting?
Spanish: My name’s Doran. I’m an airport guard… though it’s honestly duller than I expected. You’re from across the sea, right? Seen anything interesting?

English: I don’t recognize any of you. Who are you? You’re not one of those wolves, are you?
Spanish: I don’t recognize any of you. Who are you? You’re not one of those wolves, are you?

English: I'm Chiron, a soldier stationed here. We can forgive an old man for failing a mission, but not for neglecting his watch.
Spanish: I'm Chiron, a soldier stationed here. We can forgive an old man for failing a mission, but not for neglecting his watch.

English: Hey, look at those clouds. Doesn’t that one look like a cat’s face?
Spanish: Hey, look at those clouds. Doesn’t that one look like a cat’s face?

English: Hey there, I’m Bran! Sometimes listening is more important than guarding… don’t you think?
Spanish: Hey there, I’m Bran! Sometimes listening is more important than guarding… don’t you think?

English: This airport feels safe, doesn’t it? But have you ever seen fire fall from the sky where you thought you were safe?
Spanish: This airport feels safe, doesn’t it? But have you ever seen fire fall from the sky where you thought you were safe?

English: I'm Karr. If you drop your guard during wartime, that moment might be your last.
Spanish: I'm Karr. If you drop your guard during wartime, that moment might be your last.

English: …Do you need something?
Spanish: …Do you need something?

English: My name’s Zerke. Keep your questions short. I’ll help if I can.
Spanish: My name’s Zerke. Keep your questions short. I’ll help if I can.

English: It feels good to protect something, doesn’t it?
Spanish: It feels good to protect something, doesn’t it?

English: I'm Elin. My job is to make sure everyone coming through here stays safe.
Spanish: I'm Elin. My job is to make sure everyone coming through here stays safe.

English: Protecting a village isn’t simple. All those lives rest on us.
Spanish: Protecting a village isn’t simple. All those lives rest on us.

English: I am Gard. I’m one of the guardians who protect this place.
Spanish: I am Gard. I’m one of the guardians who protect this place.

English: Hello! Beautiful morning, isn’t it? I’m Gard.
Spanish: Hello! Beautiful morning, isn’t it? I’m Gard.

English: Even cats need a break sometimes. Still, patrol never stops.
Spanish: Even cats need a break sometimes. Still, patrol never stops.

English: I’m Liont. If my jokes get old, bear with me. I’ll keep this village safe.
Spanish: I’m Liont. If my jokes get old, bear with me. I’ll keep this village safe.

English: Why am I a guard? Because it’s cool. Simple as that.
Spanish: Why am I a guard? Because it’s cool. Simple as that.

English: War? I’m not afraid of it. I’ll fight until my last breath.
Spanish: War? I’m not afraid of it. I’ll fight until my last breath.

English: I’m Serkan. Need a reason to fight? I don’t. I just enjoy facing strong enemies.
Spanish: I’m Serkan. Need a reason to fight? I don’t. I just enjoy facing strong enemies.

English: Let’s make today a good one. Victory awaits.
Spanish: Let’s make today a good one. Victory awaits.

English: Why don’t those dogs come near us? Easy. They’re scared of our claws.
Spanish: Why don’t those dogs come near us? Easy. They’re scared of our claws.

English: Call me Kras. I protect this village.
Spanish: Call me Kras. I protect this village.

English: I used to be an adventurer like you… until I took an arrow to the knee.
Spanish: I used to be an adventurer like you… until I took an arrow to the knee.

English: A new face. I hope we stay on friendly terms.
Spanish: A new face. I hope we stay on friendly terms.

English: I’m Maeron. I’ve fought for a long time, and I’ll keep fighting until we win.
Spanish: I’m Maeron. I’ve fought for a long time, and I’ll keep fighting until we win.

English: You’re not ready.
Spanish: You’re not ready.

English: Great day for patrol. Is there even such a thing as bad weather? Not for me.
Spanish: Great day for patrol. Is there even such a thing as bad weather? Not for me.

English: My name’s Kerion. I’m on patrol—let me know if you spot anything odd.
Spanish: My name’s Kerion. I’m on patrol—let me know if you spot anything odd.

English: Go, adventurer… go.
Spanish: Go, adventurer… go.

English: It’s wonderful seeing everyone living in peace, isn’t it?
Spanish: It’s wonderful seeing everyone living in peace, isn’t it?

English: I’m Raon! No one loves this village more than me.
Spanish: I’m Raon! No one loves this village more than me.

English: You can’t pass.
Spanish: You can’t pass.

English: Stay calm. If the soldiers panic, who will the villagers rely on?
Spanish: Stay calm. If the soldiers panic, who will the villagers rely on?

English: I am Dreon, Captain Baron’s loyal left hand. Everything I do is for this village.
Spanish: I am Dreon, Captain Baron’s loyal left hand. Everything I do is for this village.

English: The guy next to me? He’s connected. Says he’s friends with someone named Waldo.\nDo you know who that is?
Spanish: The guy next to me? He’s connected. Says he’s friends with someone named Waldo.\nDo you know who that is?

English: You’ve made it this far… but from here on, things might get dangerous.
Spanish: You’ve made it this far… but from here on, things might get dangerous.

English: I’m Merk, head of scouting. Seen any Lycan activity?
Spanish: I’m Merk, head of scouting. Seen any Lycan activity?

English: Quiet. Scouting only works if we stay hidden.
Spanish: Quiet. Scouting only works if we stay hidden.

English: Protecting the village is an honor, but never easy—especially when those beasts outside keep baring their fangs.
Spanish: Protecting the village is an honor, but never easy—especially when those beasts outside keep baring their fangs.

English: I am Baron, captain of Eillun’s guards. As the shield and sword of this place, I won’t allow any threat near our people. Under my command, no one slacks off.
Spanish: I am Baron, captain of Eillun’s guards. As the shield and sword of this place, I won’t allow any threat near our people. Under my command, no one slacks off.

English: The Lycans are growing bolder. Keep your weapon ready.
Spanish: The Lycans are growing bolder. Keep your weapon ready.

English: This village has a long history… a very long one. But you don’t need to know everything. Sometimes knowledge becomes a burden.
Spanish: This village has a long history… a very long one. But you don’t need to know everything. Sometimes knowledge becomes a burden.
